page.title: 10NEWSPAPER CLIPPINGS
page.content: Rowland moon appeared before West Malling magistrates charged with the murder of his wife,Alison,a linen keeper at the Post House Hotel,Wrotham Heath.Mr Moon a 38 year old engineer of 1 Malling Rd,Teston.His wife died on January the 8th 85. {Golfers} Following complaints that golfers are practising on Wrotham Cricket field, Wrotham Parish Council are considering erecting a practice net near the play equipment. {Repairs} Paly equipment at Wrotham recreation ground will be repaired. This will cost 1310 pounds. The plank swing will disappear after a warning that it is unsafe. {Crops} Crops in Kemsing Road have been damaged due to frost.
